item.neutrino.harvester.tooltip: §oThe Harvester siphons the souls of the dead,
item.neutrino.harvester.tooltip2: §obefore releasing them into a cluster hex of power.
item.neutrino.enchanters_tome.tooltip: §oMeant only to be wielded by Enchanters,
item.neutrino.enchanters_tome.tooltip2: §othe magic of this artifact can summon
item.neutrino.lightning_rod.tooltip2: §ois enchanted with the power of a storming sky.
item.neutrino.updraft_tome.tooltip: §oAn ancient book filled with illegible glyphs,
item.neutrino.updraft_tome.tooltip2: §oyou feel a strange breeze as you flip the pages.
item.neutrino.soul_healer.tooltip: §oThe Soul Healer amulet is cold to the touch and
item.neutrino.soul_healer.tooltip2: §otrembles with the power of souls. It is a common
item.neutrino.soul_healer.tooltip3: §oamong the Illagers of the Woodland Mansions.

advancements.neutrino.miracle_worker.des: Obtain the Soul Healer to heal yourself
